name: Don't Look At The Light
description:
Little goofballs can't help themselves running into the deadly vortex in the middle. Luckily they have a Smiley looking out for them (that's you). Ram the goofballs to push them away from the vortex light to gain points save them. The vortex can not hurt you.

Arrow Keys or WASD to move

Made in BenBonk game jam #4. The theme was "Keep it away" and the limitation was to use a maximum of four colors.

Music by AlexiAction from Pixabay
